{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RT-AC5300 |revision=A (1.31) |series=AC5300 |upc=889349002391 |ean=0889349002391 |image1=ASUS RTAC5300.png |image1_size=200px |serialnum_prefix=FBNGZ (HW Ver. R1.31) |asin=B0167HG1V6;US; |newegg=9SIBDYCJ6U1037 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WG911BB |manuf_rev=AC44-ASU |availability=now |price=400 |est_release_date=10/21/2015 |fcc_date=05/29/2015 |fcc_id=MSQ-RTGZ00 |ic_id=3568A-RTGZ00 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=3.42 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4709C0;BCM4709C0KFEBG, UT1503 P10, E0UE-01 Z1 W; |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G200TFI00 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC256M16CP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG; |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4;,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;8;,,, 2-lane, 2-port PCIe (Gen2) Switch;ASMedia;ASM1182e;;1; |flags=MU-MIMO, AiCloud, ASUS Router App, Link Aggregation, AiMesh |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=Asuswrt-Merlin, FreshTomato |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ASUS, ASUS_5G-1, ASUS_5G-2 |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=AC:9E:17, 30:5A:3A |oui_eth=AC:9E:17, 30:5A:3A }}
:• 2x '''2165''' Mbps max PHY rate per each 80MHz wide 5GHz channel, :• 1x '''1000''' Mbps max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''5300 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Wireless-AC5300 Tri-Band Gigabit Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC5300/}} {{•}} [http://ec2-54-202-251-7.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com:8080/index.asp WebUI Demo] While not really represented well in the infobox, this is a tri-radio device - all radios
(2x 5GHz [11an+ac], 1x 2.4GHz [11bgn]) used are ('''FullMAC''' arch. targeted) '''BCM4366'''. {{see also|ASUS GT-AC5300|Arcadyan}} ===Features=== *Ultra-fast 802.11ac Wi-Fi router with a combined tri-band data rate of 5334 Mbps :for low latency online gaming, smooth 4K streaming and extremely fast file-sharing. *Broadcom ''NitroQAM'' technology boosts two 5GHz data rates up to 4330 Mbps and :2.4GHz up to 1000 Mbps. *Tri-Band with multiple devices connected at same time. Tri-Band ''Smart Connect'' :automatically selects the fastest of the three available frequency bands for each :device, based on the device’s speed, signal strength and how busy each band is. :8x capacity Wi-Fi with revolutionary ''MU-MIMO'' technology. *4x4 MIMO antenna design with ''AiRadar'' universal beamforming for unrivaled :multi-device performance and wireless signal range up to 500 m2. *Link aggregation supports close to 2 Gbps wired transmission for more :devices to faster access speed. *''AiProtection'' with ''Trend Micro'' with triple-strength total network security, :plus robust parental controls and privacy protection ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM47094 BCM47094] @1.4GHz SoC (ARM Cortex A9) *WLAN: 2x 4T4R AC [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4366 BCM4366] + 1x 4T4R N [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4366 BCM4366] @800MHz :SoC (ARM Cortex A7), 4x4 MU-MIMO, 40/80MHz, QAM-1024 :DualBand, NitroQAM, 5GHz (2x 2165Mbps), 2.4GHz (1000Mbps) ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32921-asus-rt-ac5300-wireless-ac5300-tri-band-gigabit-router-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :*CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4709C0 (KFEBG) @1.4GHz (Dual-Core ARM) :*RAM: 512 MB (DDR3), Flash: 128 MB (NAND) :*2.4GHz Radio: [[Broadcom]] BCM4366 4x4 802.11n SoC ::- [[Skyworks]] SE2623L 2.4GHz Power Amplifier (x4) :*5GHz radio: 2x [[Broadcom]] BCM4366 4x4 802.11ac SoC ::- [[RFMD]] RFPA5542 5GHz Power Amplifier Module (x8) :*PCIe: ''ASMedia'' ASM1182e (2-lane, 2-port PCIe (Gen2) Switch) *[http://www.hardwarezone.com.sg/feature-monster-ac5300-wireless-routers-face-asus-rt-ac5300-vs-netgear-nighthawk-x8 On '''HardwareZone'''] *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/ru/component/content/article/217-asus-rt-ac5300.html On '''FoxNetwork'''] (RU) *[http://www.ixbt.com/comm/asus-rt-ac5300.shtml On '''iXBT'''] (RU) :OUI: 30:5A:3A, PSU: 19V/3.42A/65W ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/asus-rt-ac5300-leak.23606/ On '''SmallNetBuilder''' forums] *[http://forum.notebookreview.com/threads/asus-rt-ac5300.780965/ On '''NotebookReview''' forums] *[http://koolshare.cn/thread-11297-1-1.html On '''KoolShare''' forums] (images PCB REV 1.31) :*CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4709C0KFEBG @1.4GHz (ARM) :*Flash: ''Spansion'' S34ML01G200TFI00 128MB (NAND) :*RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5CC256M16DP-DI 512MB (DDR3) :*2.4GHz Radio: [[Broadcom]] BCM4366KMMLG 4x4 802.11n SoC ::- 4x [[Skyworks]] SE2623L 2.4GHz Power Amplifier (32dBm, 33dB, QFN) ::- 4x [[Skyworks]] SKY85201-11 (SKY15201) 2.4GHz SPDT Switch w/ LNA :*5GHz radio: 2x [[Broadcom]] BCM4366KMMLG 4x4 802.11ac SoC ::- 8x [[RFMD]] RFPA5542 5GHz Power Amplifier Module ::- 8x [[Skyworks]] SKY85605-11 (SKY15605) 5GHz SPDT Switch w/ LNA :*PCIe: ''ASMedia'' ASM1182e (2-lane, 2-port PCIe (Gen2) Switch) ===News=== *[http://www.cnet.com/products/asus-rt-ac5300u-router/ On '''C|Net'''] *[http://www.pcper.com/news/Networking/IFA-2015-ASUS-Reveals-RT-AC5300U-Router-8-Antenna-Beast On '''PCper'''] *[http://www.ispreview.co.uk/index.php/2015/09/odd-looking-asus-rt-ac5300-router-claims-worlds-fastest-wifi.html On '''ISPreview'''] *[http://www.techhive.com/article/2979076/ifa/this-asus-router-is-a-powerful-rebuttal-to-google-onhubs-stark-simplicity.html On '''TechHive'''] *[http://www.theverge.com/2015/9/2/9238057/asus-rt-ac5300u-triband-wireless-router-ifa-2015 On '''TheVerge'''] (images) ===Misc=== *[http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s889428 PR on '''Broadcom'''] *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/8862/quantenna-maintains-80211ac-technology-lead-as-broadcom-and-marvell-launch-new-chipsets PR on '''AnandTech'''] ===See also=== *[[List of Four
